name: oidc_authentication
description: This example is similar to the (user_access_generator)[https://github.com/BarryCarlyon/twitch_misc/tree/master/authentication/user_access_generator] but covers a single scope and how to verify it. Specifically the [OIDC](https://dev.twitch.tv/docs/authentication/getting-tokens-oidc)
author: Barry Carlyon
